description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to reserved matters approval for Plot 13 (reference 18/6337/RMA, dated 18 March 2019) pursuant to the Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme. The proposed amendments relate to Condition 1 (approved drawings) to allow for the insertion of new drawings reflecting the following proposed updates: residential unit mix updated to 33 x studio units,  141 x 1 bedroom units, 151 x 2 bedroom units, 30 x 3 bedroom units, 1 x 4 bedroom units; changes to residential layout on ground and upper floors; changes to non residential ground floor layout including provision of Community Centre on the ground floor only; enlarged basement parking level linking with Plot 12; updates to building elevation treatment. The description of development is updated to include the provision of 356 residential units
